project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Implement a quiz game that asks multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays the final score at the end.

task.name: Define the questions and answers variable
Implement the function to display questions and collect user responses
Implement score tracking for correct answers
Implement the function to display the final score
Write tests for the functions implemented
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
